summary: A ballet rendition of Bram Stoker's "Dracula", stylized as an Expressionistic silent film.
cast: Wei-Qiang Zhang|Tara Birtwhistle|David Moroni|CindyMarie Small|Johnny A. Wright|Stephane Leonard|Matthew Johnson|Keir Knight|Brent Neale|Stephanie Ballard|Sarah Murphy-Dyson|Carrie Broda|Gail Stefanek|Janet Sartore|Jennifer Welsman|Emily Grizzell|Chalnessa Eames|Vanessa Lawson|Michelle Lack|Kerrie Souster
title: Dracula: Pages from a Virgin's Diary
